question.text: Your mobile phone rings while you are on the motorway. Before answering you should

explanation.text: When driving on motorways, you can’t just pull up to answer your mobile phone. Do not stop on the hard shoulder or slip road. To avoid being distracted it’s safer to switch it off when driving. If you need to be contacted plan your journey to include breaks at service areas so you can pick up any messages when you stop.

answer.text: pull up on the hard shoulder
